title: Sally Ayhan
text:
Sally Ayhan is an Australian news presenter and correspondent.
Ayhan is a former news presenter on "<a href="Nine%20News%23Perth">Nine News Perth</a>," and Washington correspondent and presenter on TRT World, based in Istanbul, Turkey. She is currently Anchor and Correspondent for <a href="CGTN%20America">CGTN America</a>.
Career.
Ayhan has reported across Europe and the Middle East region on a wide range of major breaking news stories including the <a href="refugee%20crisis">refugee crisis</a> in Greece, terror attacks in Ankara and Istanbul and the 2016 Iran elections.
Prior to working in news, Ayhan completed a period of studying and working in <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> which included writing for "Time Out Istanbul" and working for <a href="Television%20in%20Turkey">Turkish television</a>. She returned to Australia in 2008 and began to work as a presenter on various online channels including a <a href="film%20review">film review</a> program, and produced lifestyle content.
In July 2014, Sally resigned from <a href="Nine%20Network">Nine Network</a> in August to study international relations in the United Kingdom. Ayhan finished with the <a href="Nine%20Network">Nine Network</a> in September and was replaced by <a href="Scherri-Lee%20Biggs">Scherri-Lee Biggs</a>.
